data.title: Liesel Matthews's Personality Unveiled: MBTI, Enneagram and More
data.meta_description: What 16 personality type is Liesel Matthews from USA? Find out Liesel Matthews's 16 type, Enneagram, and Zodiac sign in the Soulverse, the comprehensive personality database.
data.text:
Liesel Matthews Bio

Liesel Matthews is an American actress and philanthropist. She was born on March 14, 1984, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. Matthews comes from a family of successful athletes and politicians. Her grandfather, Melvin J. Maas, was a Republican congressman from Minnesota, and her father was a former Olympic athlete. Matthews began her acting career at a young age, making her film debut in 1993 with the Steven Spielberg-directed film "A Little Princess." Her performance as Sara Crewe was critically acclaimed and earned her a Young Artist Award nomination for Best Performance by a Leading Actress in a Motion Picture. She also appeared in the films "Air Force One" and "Blast," among others. After her acting career , Matthews went on to become a philanthropist. She co-founded the non-profit organization Shine Global, which produces and distributes documentaries about human rights issues affecting children. She has produced several award-winning documentaries, including "War Dance" and "Inocente," which won the 2013 Academy Award for Best Documentary Short Subject. Matthews' work in the film industry and charitable endeavors have earned her recognition and accolades. She was named one of Variety's "10 Producers to Watch" in 2011 and received the Women's Image Network Award for Producing in 2014. Matthews continues to be an important figure in both the entertainment industry and philanthropy.

What 16 personality type is Liesel Matthews?

Based on her performance in the movie "A Little Princess," Liesel Matthews appears to exhibit characteristics of the INFJ (Introverted, Intuitive, Feeling, Judging) personality type. INFJs are known for their creativity, idealism, and compassion, which seem to resonate with Liesel's portrayal of Sara Crewe. In the movie , Liesel's character exhibits a strong sense of empathy and compassion towards others, especially those who are less fortunate. She also possesses a vivid imagination and a deep inner world, which are common traits of INFJs . Additionally, her determination to overcome adversity and maintain a positive outlook despite challenging circumstances is indicative of the INFJ's strength of character. Overall, while it is difficult to definitively determine someone's personality type, Liesel Matthews seems to exhibit traits consistent with the INFJ type. This personality type may have contributed to her success as an actress and her ability to portray complex and nuanced characters.

Which Enneagram Type is Liesel Matthews?

Liesel Matthews is an Enneagram Four personality type with a Five wing or 4w5. They are more introverted than the other 2-influenced types who also enjoy being alone. They have unique artistic interests that draw them towards avant-garde and eccentric arts as they represent deviance from what most people see on usually overrated mainstream platforms. However, their fifth wing may drive them to make a grand gesture to stand out among the crowd, or else they may feel unappreciated at all.
